Description:
Perfectly Presented
This sizable two bedroom unit is conveniently located on a quiet street, only minutes walk to the bus stop on Crusoe Rd, Healthworks Medical Clinic from Lansell Square. The home is filled with natural light from all angles and has heating and cooling to keep the climate controlled throughout the year. Both bedrooms have built in robes and are of a great size. The kitchen is equipped with gas cooking, plenty of storage and a gorgeous view of the rose bushes. Outside is a low maintenance paved area with garden bed, 2 small garden sheds as well as a carport with a roller door for security. The home is perfectly suited for a couple looking to downsize, investors or even first home buyers.

Description:
Roomy Secure Quality Unit in Quiet Established Street
This quality unit offers a lot more than just somewhere live, its features and benefits combined with location provide a great lifestyle. If you're looking for a quality home or an investment with good return an inspection is a must.
*This is not your average unit! It's large and spacious!
*Quality build in a well maintained complex of 3
*Extremely well maintained and presented
*Large open plan living, dining and kitchen
*Generous sized kitchen with plenty of cupboard and bench space
*2 generous sized bedrooms with large robes
*Ducted evaporative air conditioning & gas heating
*Fully fenced and secure back yard
*Large outdoor undercover area
*Lovely established gardens
*Solar hot water
*Water tank and automated sprinkler system
*Large single lock up garage
*Very low maintenance unit
*Close to public transport and train station, playgrounds, Carusoe reservoir and community parkland, supermarkets, specialty shops, hotels, restaurants and coffee shops.

Description:
Brand New Townhouse - So Close to All Amenities!
Set in a private and quiet location is this stunning brand new two-bedroom home offering all the benefits of low maintenance living. Set only minutes to all amenities and transportation this home is ideal for a vast range of buyers such as investors, first home owners and retirees. First home owners should also take note of the terrific stamp duty and FHOG benefits purchasing this new home offers!
This open plan design comprises of ducted heating throughout and a split system for cooling. The spacious main bedroom offers a large walk in robe and is central to the light & bright bathroom which offers a luxurious bath and separate toilet. The second bedroom is also of a great size and includes s built in robe for storage.
The kitchen, meals and living area is of a very generous size, the kitchen will include quality stainless steel appliances, a dishwasher and plenty of cupboards. This home has also been fitted with quality roller blinds throughout and 8ft 6 ceilings.
The large laundry includes internal access to the single lock up garage, the garage also includes a second rear roller door allowing access to the courtyard.
The exterior of the property will be easy to care, the low maintenance landscaping means there is nothing more for you to do! The yard is also completely enclosed with brand new colour bond fencing.
Don't delay contacting the agent for further information on this terrific package! Only minutes to all amenities, schools, child care facilities, shops and parks. Also located within great proximity to Melbourne - arrive on Melbourne's doorstep within 1 hour and a half! This home is a fantastic find.

Description:
The complete package.
Situated on approximately a 411sqm allotment at the end of a quiet court you will be pleased to find this near new eye-catching abode.
Offering a smart yet practical design the home comprises of three generous bedrooms, main with walk in robe and stunning ensuite. The remaining 2 bedrooms all include their own built in robes with easy access to the bathroom, separate toilet and laundry.
This excellent design also includes a striking kitchen with modern and effective stainless-steel appliances along with a dishwasher. The remainder of this space is fitted out with tiles and carpet creating a spacious and open plan meals and living area. There is direct access from this space to the stylish undercover alfresco area.
The front zone of the home includes a formal lounge room and internal access from the double lockup. There is ducted heating and cooling throughout allowing for the upmost comfort year-round.
Complimented with tasteful & quality fittings and fixtures throughout, a securely enclosed yard with drive through access from the garage and complete landscaping to the front and rear yards this home certainly is complete! All you have to do is move in and make it your own.
Don't delay and phone me today to arrange a viewing.

Description:
AFFORDABLE AND CONVENIENT RENOVATOR
A fantastic opportunity for first home buyers, renovators or developers right in the heart of Kangaroo Flat - without the hefty price tag! Placed perfectly within a short walk you will have all amenities including the Kangaroo Flat shopping strip, Lansell Square shopping centre, bus stop, train station, supermarket, schools and sporting facilities. Presented in original condition, the home is in reasonable order throughout to live or lease as is. However, renovate or remodel to today's modern standards and you will reap the benefits. For the slightly more astute, remove the existing home, take advantage of the flat building block that is an ideal unit site, and develop the 800m2 (approx.) corner allotment STCA. The homes comprises three bedrooms, lounge with gas heating and air-conditioning, kitchen with gas cooking and a combined bathroom/laundry. Outside has a double carport along with garden sheds. Don't let this opportunity pass you by.
Please note: ALL ENQUIRIES MUST INCLUDE A PHONE NUMBER
PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT ALL INSPECTIONS

Description:
A Perfect 1st Home or Investment Property!
This aluminum clad home is nestled in Kangaroo Flat and has three bedrooms, 2 with built in robes & a family bathroom consisting of shower, vanity basin & toilet. The lounge has been opened up to the meals area & kitchen. A stainless steel 900mm upright cooker and range-hood complete this kitchen. There's a separate laundry, split system for heating and cooling. The covered alfresco are a of 3.7m x 12.2m approx is great for casual entertaining. Also outside is a carport, garage/workshop and garden shed in a fully fenced secure yard. Close to Kangaroo Flat railway station, shopping centers, Bunnings, schools & public transport. This property has been partially renovated and is just waiting for someone to take it to the next level.

Also outside is a carport, garage/workshop and garden shed in a fully fenced secure yard. Close to Kangaroo Flat railway station, shopping centers, Bunnings, schools & public transport. This property has been partially renovated and is just waiting for someone to take it to the next level.

Description:
Easy Living in Kangaroo Flat
Modern and easily maintained, this spacious 3 bedroom home in Kangaroo Flat is close to all amenities including Lansell Square shopping precinct, Rocklea Homemaker Centre and Big Hill primary school.
Spacious, fully-tiled living areas, stylish modern fixtures and fittings and new carpets are just a few of the features of this well-built 21sq (under roof line) Metricon Home.
The open-plan living area with evaporative cooling and ducted heating, makes for comfortable living all year round.
The well-designed kitchen has stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, electric oven, gas cooktop, range hood and walk-through pantry, with access to the remote garage.
Main bathroom with shower, bath and vanity, plus main bedroom with ensuite and walk-in robe.
Outside, the level landscapes are easy to look after.
This home could be everything that you want or need.

Description:
A Must to Inspect
Situated across from Crusoe Heights Reserve on a 380m2 block, this home has charming street appeal with beautiful views looking out at the thriving greenery.
As you enter the property you'll find 3 bedrooms, all with built in robes and of generous size. Main bathroom offers a separate toilet and the home has a separate laundry.
The kitchen dining is open plan with the lounge being separate makes for a cosy space. The gas ducted central heating to both living areas and all bedrooms takes care those cold winter nights and the air conditioning for the hotter months. The kitchen is filled with natural light and has ample storage.
Outside you'll find a pergola ideal for entertaining or just sitting and relaxing.
This home ticks a lot of boxes for house hunters seeking a combination of close proximity to shopping, cafes and public transport within a short walking distance. This is a must to inspect, offering many options to the astute purchaser.

Description:
Stylish 2 Bedroom, 2 Bathroom Home. Double Carport/Garage
Hidden behind the high fence & secure roller door you will find a stylish 2 bedroom & 2 bathroom townhouse on a compact allotment. Renovated & up styled through out approx. 10 years ago. Featuring original polished floor boards, large windows & split system heat & cool. Main bedroom has an ensuite & built in robes. 2nd bedroom has BIR also as does the multi purpose Study/Lounge room. The 3 piece main bathroom caters to the laundry facilities very efficiently. A smart galley kitchen with gas cook top, dishwasher & an amazing walk in pantry & overlooks the open plan lounge living that opens out to a private outdoor living deck area with direct access to the secure double carport with roller door. The big surprise here is the front courtyard garden that is utilized as an amazing edible garden with raised veggie patches , espaliered apple trees, grape vines & much more. This is most certainly a surprise package here hiding behind a most unassuming facade. You must inspect to appreciate.

Description:
Soul Filled Spaces on Spencer
Warm and inviting with a modern feel, this sun filled 3 bedroom 2 bathroom single level family home has an open and airy ambiance in perfectly manicured surrounds.
Full of light, this easy care residence enjoys a beautiful lounge, spacious main bedroom (WIR & classic ensuite), 2 further bedrooms (BIRs), bright 3 piece bathroom, large european laundry, updated practical kitchen with Beaumatic dishwasher overlooking an established leafy & private front garden with lush, decorative espalier.
Immaculately maintained, this secure haven features a security door, gas heating, split system air conditioning, ceiling fans, fantastic storage, near new carpet, 6x6m shed with concrete floor and power & adjoining double carport ideal for the caravan or boat. An expansive addition to the rear offers an open plan study and second living area/children's retreat making this the perfect pick for families. All set on an enviable and hard to find 969 approx. sqm block ensures wonderful space within a whisper quiet street. An inviting outdoor area leading from the dining & 2nd living is surrounded by an established fernery and boasts a solid fuel heater for those cold winter nights which are sure to roll around before we know it.
Around the corner from Crusoe College, Childcare & the local bus stop with great shopping nearby at Charter Hall means this one has it all for anyone wanting to make their next move a wise one!

Description:

This is the one you have been waiting for!
A solid brick home and a fantastic all-rounder. The flexible floor plan provides great separation and living options to suit both young and older families - no matter what buyer category you fall in to, up-sizer, down-sizer or right-sizer, you will struggle to find better value than this.
A practical floor plan maximises internal space while a generous outdoor alfresco provides room to move and entertain. Freshly painted throughout along with the decking under the alfresco and the outside less than twelve months ago, all the hard work has been done.
This property would make a perfect first home or is ideal for busy professionals or the astute investor. Those seeking to get a foothold into this fantastic location will need to be quick to secure this home.
Features include:
3 bedrooms all with built in robes
Tiling to the main living areas
Air-conditioning
Gas heating
Ceiling fans to all living areas and bedrooms
3m x 6.7m alfresco
Large backyard

This is a truly special opportunity to secure a great property just minutes to everything.

Description:
Ideal investment opportunity with great tenants
Lifestyle! Situated in a quiet, friendly court with great neighbours this home is on a 915 m2 block (approximately) with side access. The property is currently being leased at $340 per week, for 12 months (approx.) to a secure tenant. Featuring 3 great sized bedrooms, this large home accommodates all needs. The main bedroom includes a large walk-in robe and ensuite, whilst the second bedroom has a huge walk-in robe and the third has a built-in robe. The living spaces consist of a formal lounge and dining area at the front of the home with 2 way access; an open plan meals and living area is off the kitchen, with the added bonus of a study nook. This space opens out directly on to a fantastic alfresco/entertaining area. The kitchen itself features brand new appliances. The large central bathroom offers a bath and shower with separate toilet. The laundry is also separately located and has access to the rear yard. Climate control is taken care of with ducted heating and split system heating/cooling with ceiling fans in the meals area and main bedroom. The fully enclosed rear yard allows plenty of space to keep the kids busy and the front yard has room for a caravan. A double lock-up garage, plenty of grass and low maintenance garden beds featuring an automated sprinkler system complete this perfect package. Located within walking distance of Lansell Plaza, Crusoe Reservoir and walking trails and close to all other amenities including schools, child care, public transport and medical facilities.

Description:
Cosy Home with a Place to Tinker
Nestled in a quiet street a short stroll to the bus stop and health clinic in Hope Street is this home with many extras including car storage and shedding. With heaps of charm you could not go wrong for an affordable downsizer or investment with an appraised return of $250 - $260 per week. Well presented from the street with low maintenance gardens, the front of the home has protection from the afternoon sun with a front verandah and shade awnings. Entering through the front a light filled lounge adjoins the dining/kitchen area that then looks over a decked & enclosed undercover area, perfect to sit for that morning cup of coffee or protect those precious pot plants. Towards the back of the home are two bedrooms the main with 3 door built in robes while the smart design of the bathroom includes a european laundry saving on space.
Other internal features include;
Gas wall furnace & reverse cyle air conditioner
Ceiling fans in most rooms
Security doors on entry points
Kitchen with all gas cook top and pantry
On the block measuring approximately 630m2
the secure yard has side car access but the real bonus is the carport that can house 3 cars or you can drive through to the 8mtr x 6mtr shed designed for tinkering complete with a concrete floor and power. An undercover area and chook/dog run out the back provides flexibility for use or remove them and you could create room for a nice lawn or plenty of vege patches. Call our friendly team to inspect today
